org.ensembl.driver
Interface ExternalRefAdaptor

All Superinterfaces:
Adaptor, java.rmi.Remote
public interface ExternalRefAdaptor
extends Adaptor

Provides access to ExternalRefs in the datasource.

Field Summary
static java.lang.String TYPE
          Name of the default ExternalEefAdaptor available from a driver.
 
Method Summary
 void delete(ExternalRef externalRef)
          Deletes externalRef from datasource, does nothing if externalRef is not in datasource.
 void delete(long internalID)
          Deletes ExternalRef, with specified internalID, from datasource, does nothing if externalRef is not in datasource.
 java.util.List fetch(long internalID)
          Fetches ExternalRefs with the specified _internalID_.
 java.util.List fetch(long internalID, int type)
          Fetches ExternalRefs for the item with the specified _type_ and _internalID_.
 java.util.List fetch(java.lang.String name)
          Fetches ExternalRefs where name appears as either a primaryID, displayID or synonym.
 long store(ExternalRef externalRef)
          Stores ExternalRef.
 long storeObjectExternalRefLink(long ensemblInternalID, int ensemblType, long externalRefInternalID)
          Stores a link between an ensembl object and an externalRef.

Method Detail

fetch

public java.util.List fetch(long internalID)
                     throws AdaptorException
Fetches ExternalRefs with the specified _internalID_.

Parameters:
internalID - id of the persistent object to find references for
Returns:
List containing zero or more ExternalRefs.
Throws:
AdaptorException

fetch

public java.util.List fetch(long internalID,
                            int type)
                     throws AdaptorException
Fetches ExternalRefs for the item with the specified _type_ and _internalID_.

Parameters:
internalID - id of the persistent object to find references for
type - type of object, must be one of ExternalRef.GENE, ExternalRef.TRANSLATION, ExternalRef.TRANSCRIPT or ExternalRef.CLONE_FRAGMENT
Returns:
List containing zero or more ExternalRefs for the specified item.
Throws:
AdaptorException

fetch

public java.util.List fetch(java.lang.String name)
                     throws AdaptorException
Fetches ExternalRefs where name appears as either a primaryID, displayID or synonym.

Parameters:
name - Synonym to find matching refs for.
Returns:
List containing zero or more ExternalRefs with the specified synonym.
Throws:
AdaptorException

                                       int ensemblType,
                                       long externalRefInternalID)
                                throws AdaptorException
Stores a link between an ensembl object and an externalRef.

Parameters:

ensemblType - type of object to link.
externalRefInternalID - internalID of the externalRef to link.
